text: == Events == === By place === ==== Eastern Roman Empire ==== * Isaurian War: the Isaurian rebels are defeated. ==== Europe ==== * The Alemanni are defeated by the Franks under Clovis I near Bonn. ==== Asia ==== * The Shaolin Temple is founded. For alternate founding date, see 477). === By topic === ==== Arts and sciences ==== * Aryabhata, an Indian astronomer and mathematician, calculates pi (π) as ≈ 62832/20000 = 3.1416, correct to four rounded-off decimal places. == Births == * Abdul Mutallib, son of Hashim * Chloderic, son of Clovis I == Deaths == * Hashim, great-grandfather of Muhammad, (possibly in Gaza) * Yuan Xun Category:490s
